name: SpeechAndHearingEvaluation
title: Speech and Hearing Evaluation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for encounters for speech or hearing evaluation.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an encounter for the evaluation of speech and/or hearing related abilities.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Medical evaluation for speech, language and/or hearing problems (regime/therapy)
Medical evaluation of speech, language and hearing problem (procedure)
Special audiologic evaluation for functional hearing loss (procedure)

contains.display: Medical evaluation for speech, language and/or hearing problems (regime/therapy)
